title: Sednit
extract: En Route with Sednit. 45. EXECUTIvE SUMMaRY. The Sednit group — also known as APT28, Fancy Bear and Sofacy — is a group of attackers operating since 2004 if not earlier and whose main objective is to steal confidential information from specific targets.
extract_html: En Route with Sednit. 45. EXECUTIvE SUMMaRY. The Sednit group — also known as APT28, Fancy Bear and Sofacy — is a group of attackers operating since 2004 if not earlier and whose main objective is to steal confidential information from specific targets.
